definition: to act with self-restraint/to examine oneself/to perform a self-test
to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint

sentences.english: To design totally self-checking (TSC) circuit is an effective method for increasing its reliability.
sentences.chinese: 設計全自檢線路，是提高數字線路可靠性的有效方法。

sentences.english: What's the best way to do a breast self-exam?
sentences.chinese: 最佳乳腺自檢方法是什麼？

sentences.english: Switch on the ignition and check system's functionality.
sentences.chinese: 旋轉鑰匙到二檔檢查系統自檢？

sentences.english: With the ability to self-test and slovenly problems to overcome.
sentences.chinese: 有了自檢的能力，馬虎的毛病才能克服。

sentences.english: A practical self-calibrating bundle block adjustment program is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一個實用的自檢校光束法區域平差程序。

sentences.english: Complete self-inspection report, and follow up the actions related to self-inspection findings.
sentences.chinese: 完成自檢報告，並跟進整改行動。

sentences.english: A self-test consists of one engineer in the orbiter and one in the firing room.
sentences.chinese: 自檢包括一名工程師在航天飛機在發射室之一。

sentences.english: All women need to make sure they are doing enough themselves to ensure early detection.
sentences.chinese: 所有女性都應自己多做自檢，確保及早發現病情。

sentences.english: They will also be of value to manufacturers themselves when engaged in self-inspection or audit.
sentences.chinese: 同時它對製藥企業的自檢和審計也是有價值的。

sentences.english: Strong self-checking function ensures the instrument to be in the best condition always.
sentences.chinese: 自檢功能強，確保儀器時刻處於最佳狀態。

sentences.english: Momentarily pressing the test switch initiates the self-test diagnostic routine.
sentences.chinese: 點觸式按壓測試電門可以啓動自檢診斷常規程序。

sentences.english: HVI cotton measuring instrument in actual use during the boot are often unable to self-test.
sentences.chinese: HVI棉測儀在實際使用過程中開機時常常無法自檢。

sentences.english: The only properties found during introspection will be those coded into the class.
sentences.chinese: 只有那些在自檢過程中找到的屬性纔會編碼到該類中。

sentences.english: D. Postmenopausal women should perform breast self-examination on the same day of each month.
sentences.chinese: 絕經後婦女應每月相同時間進行自檢。

definition: to turn peril into safety (idiom); to avert a danger (esp. political or medical)
to form a picture/to develop a photo/to visualize
to run a newspaper/to publish a newspaper
